Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure without amendment. With written report No. 98-6.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain lands by exchange for addition to Effigy Mounds National Monument in the State of Iowa, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to accept a conveyance of land adjacent to the Effigy Mounds National Monument in Iowa for addition to such monument and, in exchange for such lands, to convey to the grantor other specified lands within the monument.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain lands by exchange for addition to Effigy Mounds National Monument in the State of Iowa, and for other purposes.
